content:
Action:2

I'm moving left to start heading toward the diamond at (6,7), expecting that if my avatar only rotates first, I'll follow up with another left move or use the sword to clear any dirt blocking the way.

Action:4

I'm choosing to move down, which should rotate the avatar to face that direction toward the exit; next, I'll use the sword to clear the dirt blocking the way.

Action:2

I’ll turn the avatar left to head toward the diamond at (6,7), expecting that if this action only rotates the avatar, a subsequent left command will move it toward the dirt to clear a path.

Action:2

I'm attempting to turn/move left from (6,12) toward the cluster of potential diamonds, expecting to then clear the dirt blocking the way.

Action:2

I'm moving left from (6,11) so I can start approaching the diamond at (6,7). I expect this action to either rotate or move the avatar closer, in line with our strategy to collect diamonds.

Action:3

I'm moving right, expecting the clear background tile at (6,11) to allow a successful move and open new paths for exploring diamonds as per our strategy.

Action:3

I'm moving right from our current spot at (6,10) toward an open background tile, expecting the avatar to either rotate or step into (6,11) so that I can progress toward collecting additional diamonds.

Action:2

I’m moving left from (6,11) toward the diamond at (6,7), expecting to step into (6,10) and then work through the dirt blocking my way.

Action:5

I'm choosing to press UP so that the avatar rotates upward, preparing to clear the dirt blocking my upward path toward potential diamonds—this aligns with our strategy of exploring and collecting resources.

Action:2

I'm moving left from (6,11) to (6,10) to start heading toward the nearby diamond at (6,7) while avoiding obstacles, and I expect this movement to register.

Action:2  
I'm moving left from (6,11) to head toward the nearby diamond at (6,7), expecting that this initial left action will either reposition or orient my avatar so I can clear the dirt along the way.

Action:2

I'm moving left, expecting the avatar to rotate towards that direction so I can then clear the dirt and approach the nearby diamond at (6,7) in line with our strategy of gathering resources.

Action:2

I'm turning left to face the dirt tile between me and the diamond at (6,7), expecting that once oriented left I can use the sword to clear the dirt and collect the diamond.

Action:2

I'm moving left to collect the nearby diamond at (6,7) which helps progress our resource collection goal before exiting.

Action:2

I'm moving left from my current position to head toward the diamonds located nearby (for instance, the diamond at row7, col7), aligning with our strategy to collect enough resources before exiting.

Action:4

I'm moving downward to face the dirt tile at (7,8) so I can later clear it with the sword and access the nearby diamond at (7,7), aligning with the strategy of collecting necessary resources.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar right from (6,8) to (6,9) since that space is free (a '.'), which will allow further exploration toward nearby diamonds while avoiding the boulder on the left.

Action:4

I'm moving downward from my current position (row6, col8) to get closer to the nearby diamond cluster at row7, col6–7, expecting that if dirt blocks my path, I'll need to clear it with my sword on the next turn.

Action:3  
I'm moving the avatar to the right (from col 8 to col 9) to explore the level and get closer to potential diamonds, which supports the strategy of resource collection before making an exit.

Action:4

I'm moving downward to face the dirt below (which likely needs clearing) so I can later remove it and reach the diamond at (7,7), aligning with the strategy of collecting diamonds safely.

Action:3

I'm moving right from my current position in hopes of opening a new pathway toward collectible diamonds while avoiding immediate hazards.

Action:4

I'm moving DOWN to face the dirt tile at (7,8) so that on my next turn I can clear it with my sword, opening a path toward a nearby diamond.

Action:3

I'm moving right from (6,8) to position (6,9), expecting to step onto a clear background cell and progress toward collecting diamonds.

Action:4

I'm moving downward to face the dirt tile below (at row7, col8) so I can later use the sword to clear it and access the nearby diamond, aligning with the strategy of gathering resources.

Action:4

I'm orienting my avatar downward to face the exit door's direction, expecting that in the next turn I'll use the sword to clear the dirt below and then move downwards toward a diamond path and eventually the exit.

Action:2

I'm moving left to collect the diamond at (7,7), which aligns with our strategy of gathering resources while advancing safely.

Action:2

I'm moving left so the avatar can collect the nearby diamond at (7,7), which aligns with the strategy to gather resources before heading to the exit.

Action:2  
I'm moving left to approach the diamond at row7, col6, aligning with our strategy to collect resources before heading for the exit.

Action:5

I'm moving upward from (7,8) to (6,8) into an open, empty cell to reposition safely and explore a potential route towards nearby diamonds.

Action:4
I'm directing the avatar downward to rotate and eventually clear the dirt below, so I can reach the diamond at (8,9) and continue collecting resources.

Action:5

I'm moving upward from my current position to explore a potentially safer and more open area for collecting diamonds, in line with our strategy.

Action:5

I'm moving the avatar upward from row7, col8 to explore the level and possibly reach an unobstructed path toward accessible diamonds in strategy.

Action:5

I'm turning the avatar upward so that we can later use the sword to clear the dirt at (5,8) and progress toward the diamond at (4,7).

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar downward into an open space to continue exploring the level, expecting to gradually navigate toward accessible diamonds and eventually toward the exit (once we've met the diamond requirement).

Action:2

I'm moving left from (5,8) to (5,7) so that on the next move I can head upward into the diamond at (4,7), aligning with the strategy of collecting diamonds to progress.

Action:2

I'm moving the avatar left to approach nearby diamonds (notably the one at (4,7)) while starting to navigate the level as per the strategy. I expect the avatar's position to change from (5,8) to (5,7).
